item.title: Why i am lived
item.description: Why i am lived Three passions, simple but overwhelmingly strong, have governed my life: the longing for love, the search for knowledge, and unbearable pity for the suffering of mankind. These passions, like great winds, have blown me hither and thither, in a wayward course, over a deep ocean of anguish, reaching to the very verge of despair. With equal passion I have sought knowledge. I have wished to understand the hearts of men.
